multiple_choice.question: Who were at the bottom of the pool?
How did the snakes want to move on the earth above?
On the earth, what did the snakes turn into?

fill_in_the_blanks.question: The snakes saw the earth above, full of colours and shapes and feathered creatures
The tips of their tails split into two
We will look after the grass and the trees

meanings.creature: an animal, as distinct from a human being

meanings.surface: the outside part or uppermost layer of something
meanings.beast: an animal, especially a large or dangerous four-footed one
meanings.warm: at a fairly or comfortably high temperature
meanings.lightning: a flash or discharge of lightning
